description: Sum_{mu a partition of n} (f^mu/n!)^{-2} where f^mu is the number of standard Young tableaux of shape mu.
comments: Arises from counting coverings of a genus g=2 Riemann surface - expansion of generating function A_g(q) = sum_{n>=0} a_{n,g} q^n where a_{n,g} = sum_{mu a partition of n} (f^mu/n!)^{2-2g}; note that A_0(q) = e^q and A_1(q) = prod_{i>=1} 1/(1-q^i).
links: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..60
mathematica: (* version 4.0 *) Needs["DiscreteMath`Combinatorica`]; Table[Tr[(n!/ (NumberOfTableaux /@ Partitions[n]))^2],{n,20}] [From _Wouter Meeussen_, Sep 30 2010]
author: _Bruce E. Sagan_, Apr 06 2002
